nodes.text: Warm Thoughts for Invertebrates was a book authored by Dxulininan. It was for sale in 23 BBY and was, for a time, the third best-selling book according to the CoCo Town Edition of the HoloNet News.

A ranking of the five best-selling books, from 23 BBY, including the number-three ranked Warm Thoughts for Invertebrates, appeared in HoloNet News Vol. 531 45 (2002), an in-universe website created in 2002 to publicize the upcoming film Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones. Pablo Hidalgo and Paul Ens wrote the site content.
